attributes.action: Ban the use of gill nets within uk territorial waters and push for a europe wide ban.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gill nets can be placed in an area to fish indistriminately until the owner retrieves them. In bad weather this could be a week or more which means the fish is useless, also if lost they keep catching and killing fish needlessly. Most inshore illegal fishing is aided by the use of gill nets and so may help prevent this practise.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Ban the use of gill nets within uk territorial waters and push for a europe wide ban."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14985.asp

Prime Minister's Office
